[[2009-10 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|2009-10]] |} [[Mersin Idman Yurdu|Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] S.K. has finished [[TFF Second League]] Promotion Group at second place in 2008-09 season. details] |} ==U-18 team== [[Turkish Football Federation|TFF]] organized "DeplasmanlÄ± SÃ¼per GenÃ§ler Ligi (DSGL) (Away-Home Super Youth League) in 2008-09. League was formed by 10 regional groups. Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu U-18 team took place in [[Adana]] Group with 12 other teams from clubs that participated that year in professional leagues. MÄ°Y youth team finished 2nd after [[Adana Demirspor]]See league table and results from TFF [http://www.tff.org/Default.aspx?pageID=619&grupID=525&hafta=26#grp DSGL League 2008-09].. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! ! Week ! Position ! Played ! Win ! Draw ! Lost ! For ! Against ! Diff. ! Points |- | First half | 13 || 1 || 12 || 9 || 3 || 0 || 26 || 6 || 20 || 30 |- | Second half | 26 || 2 || 24 || 16 || 6 || 2 || 53 || 18 || 35 || 54 |} Being runner-ups of Adana Group, MÄ°Y U-18 team promoted to national group stage, where three teams played elimination games. MÄ°Y eliminated [[ÅanlÄ±urfaspor]] 1-0 (a.e.t)Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu-ÅanlÄ±urfaspor: 1-0 [http://www.tff.org/Default.aspx?pageID=29&macId=79441 Game details] and [[Tokatspor]] 7-6 (1-1 and 6-5 pen.)Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu-Tokatspor: 7-6 [http://www.tff.org/Default.aspx?pageID=29&macId=79455 Game details] in Group B. The group B games were played in [[KahramanmaraÅ]]. In quarter-finals MÄ°Y U-18 team lost to [[Gaziantepspor]] 1-2Mersin idmanyurdu-Gaziantepspor: 1-2 [http://www.tff.org/Default.aspx?pageID=29&macId=79466 Game details] in [[Ä°stanbul]] and was eliminated. Later [[Gaziantepspor]] was eliminated at semi-finals. ==References== {{reflist|2}} ==See also== * [[Football in Turkey]] * [[TFF Second League]] {{Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu Seasons}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Mersin Idmanyurdu 2008-09 Season}} [[Category:Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu Seasons]]
